name: Talk Servant
_source: s;Man3;We're really under seige...{w}{br}Lady Moran was supposed to protect us.{w}{br}What'll happen to our families?
s;Man2;Maybe we still have a chance.{w}{br}Lady Moran's armies are still fighting.
s;Man3;Borris, you must face reality.{w}{br}A dragon is attacking.{w} There's no way we survive this...{w}{br}There's nowhere to run.{w}{br}All we can do now is pray.
